UniprotID	P78549
Accession	P78549;Q1MVR1;Q99566;Q99794;Q9BPX2
EntryName	NTH_HUMAN
ProteinName	Endonuclease III-like protein 1 (hNTH1) (EC 3.2.2.-) (EC 4.2.99.18) (Bifunctional DNA N-glycosylase/DNA-(apurinic or apyrimidinic site) lyase) (DNA glycosylase/AP lyase)
GeneName	NTHL1 NTH1 OCTS3
Length	304
Function	Bifunctional DNA N-glycosylase with associated apurinic/apyrimidinic (AP) lyase function that catalyzes the first step in base excision repair (BER), the primary repair pathway for the repair of oxidative DNA damage (PubMed:29610152, PubMed:9927729). The DNA N-glycosylase activity releases the damaged DNA base from DNA by cleaving the N-glycosidic bond, leaving an AP site. The AP-lyase activity cleaves the phosphodiester bond 3' to the AP site by a beta-elimination. Primarily recognizes and repairs oxidative base damage of pyrimidines. Also has 8-oxo-7,8-dihydroguanine (8-oxoG) DNA glycosylase activity. Acts preferentially on DNA damage opposite guanine residues in DNA. Is able to process lesions in nucleosomes without requiring or inducing nucleosome disruption.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Mitochondrion
Disorder	0.7951,0.6991,0.7209,0.7120,0.7209,0.7163,0.6482,0.6712,0.6806,0.6991,0.7036,0.7209,0.7459,0.7505,0.7459,0.7369,0.7250,0.7250,0.7505,0.7629,0.7595,0.6661,0.7289,0.7289,0.7505,0.7843,0.7951,0.8713,0.8085,0.8085,0.8085,0.8125,0.8125,0.8493,0.8313,0.7881,0.7843,0.7799,0.7755,0.7415,0.7459,0.7547,0.8493,0.8741,0.8235,0.8235,0.7951,0.8235,0.7982,0.8565,0.8375,0.8493,0.8493,0.7843,0.8013,0.7629,0.7629,0.6576,0.6851,0.6906,0.6948,0.7036,0.6906,0.6948,0.6576,0.7209,0.7289,0.7289,0.6661,0.6712,0.7120,0.6482,0.6322,0.5620,0.6806,0.6089,0.5456,0.5758,0.7163,0.7209,0.7289,0.5951,0.5951,0.6089,0.6089,0.5254,0.4652,0.4725,0.3948,0.4149,0.3872,0.3356,0.3983,0.4119,0.4619,0.4330,0.4979,0.5854,0.6183,0.5139,0.5139,0.5176,0.5493,0.5419,0.5342,0.5296,0.6269,0.6043,0.4940,0.5951,0.5951,0.6227,0.6227,0.6620,0.6851,0.6851,0.6043,0.5951,0.6269,0.4831,0.5577,0.4801,0.3948,0.3910,0.3910,0.3117,0.2715,0.1881,0.2541,0.3321,0.3286,0.3321,0.3321,0.3667,0.3460,0.2541,0.2575,0.2884,0.2884,0.2609,0.3087,0.3087,0.3667,0.3599,0.4330,0.4051,0.4864,0.5211,0.5176,0.5211,0.4541,0.4541,0.4507,0.3631,0.2783,0.2783,0.3426,0.3494,0.3840,0.3599,0.3872,0.3460,0.3392,0.3356,0.3356,0.2503,0.1852,0.2094,0.1554,0.2258,0.1349,0.1092,0.1028,0.1028,0.1611,0.1702,0.1643,0.0967,0.0518,0.0483,0.0592,0.0592,0.0948,0.0780,0.0443,0.0443,0.0780,0.1424,0.1251,0.1028,0.1007,0.1791,0.2783,0.1942,0.2193,0.1942,0.2541,0.1914,0.2541,0.3529,0.2715,0.2034,0.1731,0.1137,0.1528,0.2292,0.2436,0.2364,0.2541,0.2503,0.3087,0.2783,0.2849,0.1942,0.2503,0.1881,0.1881,0.1349,0.1611,0.1115,0.1028,0.1643,0.1583,0.1823,0.2575,0.1501,0.1298,0.1298,0.1373,0.1206,0.1229,0.1048,0.1251,0.1229,0.1184,0.1184,0.1528,0.1759,0.1611,0.1881,0.1914,0.1969,0.1942,0.2609,0.2328,0.2399,0.3286,0.3529,0.4476,0.4507,0.4619,0.4619,0.5342,0.4940,0.4619,0.4685,0.5176,0.5211,0.4256,0.4256,0.4476,0.5533,0.5620,0.4652,0.3740,0.4051,0.4149,0.3215,0.3356,0.3087,0.2129,0.1323,0.0909,0.0909,0.0555,0.0662,0.1137,0.1092,0.1048,0.1007,0.1028,0.1028,0.0690,0.0646,0.1
